name: White Hillz
description:
A little platformer created during the 48 hour 1 Bit Jam!

Avoid the enemies and reach the end of the screen.  You can hide in the white hills to get past the enemy. Get through 16 rooms!

CONTROLLS:

A and D - walk left and right

K - jump (only available by collecting the feather)

UPDATE before deadline:

- sound added

- player jump a little bit higher
